eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Cass, MN; AT 11:50 AM ON SEP 10, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:17 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: TEST-reunification Center for bus crash at the Pine River/Backus School, 401 Murray Avenue, Door #31, Pine River for parents/guardians
